meanings.definition: Lively and noisy festivities, especially involving drinking and dancing.
meanings.sent1: The revelment at the party was so loud and fun!
meanings.sent2: The town square was filled with revelment during the festival.
meanings.sent3: The revelment at the wedding made everyone smile and dance.
meanings.sent4: The revelment in the air was like a joyful melody.
meanings.sent5: I will always remember the revelment of that celebration.

meanings.definition: The act of engaging in lively and noisy festivities.
meanings.sent1: We joined the revelment with laughter and joy.
meanings.sent2: Her eyes sparkled with excitement during the revelment.
meanings.sent3: The revelment turned a regular night into a magical one.
meanings.sent4: The revelment of the crowd was like a symphony of happiness.
meanings.sent5: The revelment of the parade filled the streets with energy.
